item.title: Mounts & Sights QR Code
item.description: You are probably here because you scanned one of the QR codes present in the Mounts & Sights mod for DayZ (Steam Workshop page). If you are enjoying the mod and want to foment further development, consider making a donation: If you’ve been redirected here from a server that is not using a mod called “Mounts & Sights”, it means that you are playing in a server that is using a illegal version of the mod.
